name: OverTheNet2
description:
After the huge success of "Over The Net", here is "Over The Net Beach Volley V2" with lots of news.
GAMECENTER and BLUETOOTH MULTIPLAYER!
You can play exciting games in the world's most beautiful beaches.
Here are the main news:
• new design
• improved artificial intelligence
• larger playing fields
• "Practice" mode: gives you the possibility of a not-limited training, without points and interruptions
• "Single game" mode: you can choose your own team among 14 possibilities and one out of 11 beaches.
• "World tour": after you have chosen your team, you start a world competition in 11 different beaches playing with stronger and stronger teams.
• new "spikes training"
• leaderboards achievements, Open Feint and Game Center with world rankings
• ultra simple game mode: you play with just one button!
• intermediate #1 game mode: the player moves automatically and you spike with the "swipe"
• intermediate #2 game modes: move the player with the PAD and spike with the button
• professional mode: move the player with the PAD and spike doing the "swipe"
• Multiplayer Game Center: you can challenge other players around the world!
• Bluetooth multiplayer: Play with your friends for exciting challenges
• added new playing fields
• added new teams
• different levels of difficulty
• World Tournament: You will challenge you with all teams to become world champion!

FOR ANY PROBLEM CONTACT THE SUPPORT.
